title: The Post After the Second Post
content: Take a toke of smoke from me as you dream inside Let your days slip away come with me and ride My darlin' You aren't the average kind You need the comfort of my lovin' To bring out the best in you I hope that you do See what you've given to me Separatin', Debatin'And we're gonna see this love throughYou can't leave me(No way) It ain't that easy(No way) To walk away(Just stay) When I want you to stay, baby(Give yourself a chance) You can't leave meIt ain't that easy(Okay) Ow ow ow
